author: stefan2
msg: Set FSFS cache default size to 16 MB. This is the same default as
for everybody else, namely the server processes. Thus, it should
be reasonable value on the same machines.
(main): use the default cache size defined for everybody else for svnadmin as well

author: ate
msg: JS2-1245: Update some external artifact dependencies to more recent and general available versions
- package the com.google.step2 "fork" under folder openid-step2 as org.apache.portals-jetspeed-2:com-google-step2-common:jar:0
and integrate in the build as a jetspeed-2  artifact we release ourselves (requires us to use/repackage using a apache groupId)
Note: the com.google.step2 project hasn't put out any non-SNAPSHOT release so far and our "fork" is based/pinned on a specific revision.
